body_html:
Hello @sguada ,

Thank you. I added a switch for this and left the original behavior as default. Can you review the code and see if it matches to the standards or if anything more needs to be done ? I found one more issue addressing the same change issue #443. I think that can also be closed.

Thanks,

  • Manju

body:
Hello @sguada ,

Thank you. I added a switch for this and left the original behavior as default. Can you review the code and see if it matches to the standards  or if anything more needs to be done ? I found one more issue addressing the same change issue #443. I think that can also be closed.

Thanks,
- Manju
